Section.Catchline: Record in original language; English translation.

SectionBody.Text: A record filed with a tribunal of this state under this part must be in the original language and, if not in English, must be accompanied by an English translation.

Note.Text: Section 71, ch. 2011-92, created s. 88.7131, to be effective on a date contingent upon the provisions of s. 81, ch. 2011-92. Section 81, ch. 2011-92, provides that “[e]xcept as otherwise expressly provided in this act, this act shall take effect upon the earlier of 90 days following Congress amending 42 U.S.C. s. 666(f) to allow or require states to adopt the 2008 version of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act, or 90 days following the state obtaining a waiver of its state plan requirement under Title IV-D of the Social Security Act.”
